title: Transactions
caption: This wallet has a total of {{numTxTotal}} transactions.
subCaption: Click on a transaction to see more details or set a filter to narrow down the list.
noMatch: Could not find any transactions matching that search.

sync.line1: Not all transaction details are loaded yet.

sync.autosync: To filter on more data points, e.g. asset metadata, enable account history sync.
